abstract: Although its share of the nation’s venture capital investments has shrunk from a year ago, the Bay Area remains the most desirable place by far for venture capitalists, according to an Ernst & Young and Dow Jones VentureOne study.
lead_paragraph: Although its share of the nation’s venture capital investments has shrunk from a year ago, the Bay Area remains the most desirable place by far for venture capitalists, according to an Ernst & Young and Dow Jones VentureOne study.

headline.main: Bay Area Takes Lion Share of V.C. Investment, Study Finds
